# Sirine's Grace (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Bard Spells|Bard 4]], [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 9]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a shard of mirror)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 191

*Upon completion of this spell, you are infused with unearthly grace and confidence.*

For the duration of this spell, you gain a +4 enhancement bonus to Charisma and Dexterity, a deflection bonus to AC equal to your Charisma modifier, and a +8 bonus on [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]] checks. You also gain a swim speed of 60 feet and the ability to breathe water. You can move and attack normally while underwater, even with slashing or bludgeoning weapons.
